item.title: ScanText
item.description: {{ ScanText Field }} Example type Book struct { ID int64 Sales big.Int } var queryBook = sqlt.First[string, Book](sqlt.Parse(` SELECT id {{ ScanInt "ID" }} , sales {{ ScanText "Sales" }} FROM books WHERE title = {{ . }} `))
